009package Ch09_Automatic_Thresholding;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
016import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
017
018import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.askForSampleImage;
019import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
020
021/**
022 * <p>
023 * ImageJ plugin making available a selection of global thresholders.
024 * See Sec. 9.1 of [1] for additional details.
025 * </p>
026 * <p>
027 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic
028 * Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
029 * </p>
030 * 
031 * @author WB
032 * @version 2022/04/02
033 * 
034 * @see Global_Isodata
035 * @see Global_MaxEntropy
036 * @see Global_Mean
037 * @see Global_Median
038 * @see Global_MinError
039 * @see Global_MinMax
040 * @see Global_Otsu
041 */
042public class Global_All implements PlugInFilter {
043        
044        enum Algorithm {
045                IsoData(Global_Isodata.class), 
046                MaxEntropy(Global_MaxEntropy.class),
047                Mean(Global_Mean.class),
048                Median(Global_Median.class),
049                MinError(Global_MinError.class),
050                MinMax(Global_MinMax.class),
051                Otsu(Global_Otsu.class);
052                
053                final Class<? extends PlugInFilter> pluginClass;
054                
055                Algorithm(Class<? extends PlugInFilter> cls) {
056                        this.pluginClass = cls;
057                }
058        }
059        
060        private static Algorithm algo = Algorithm.IsoData;
061        private ImagePlus imp = null;
062        
063        /**
064         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
065         * is currently open.
066         */
067        public Global_All() {
068                if (noCurrentImage()) {
069                        askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Kepler);
070                }
071        }
072        
073        @Override
074        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
075                this.imp = imp;
076                return DOES_8G;
077        }
078
079        @Override
080        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
081                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
082                gd.addEnumChoice("Algorithm", algo);
083                
084                gd.showDialog();
085                if (gd.wasCanceled())
086                        return;
087                
088                algo = gd.getNextEnumChoice(Algorithm.class);
089                imp.unlock();
090                
091                IjUtils.runPlugInFilter(algo.pluginClass);
092//              IJ.runPlugIn(imp, algo.pluginClass.getCanonicalName(), null);
093        }
094
095}
